name: Quality_OEE
Performance_OEE
func:
var getDataCycletime = 60 // Ideal cycle time dalam detik
var hour = 28800 // 8 jam dalam detik
var getDataShudownTime = flow.get("Shutdown_Time")
var totalCount = flow.get("Total_Qty") // jumlah produk (OK + NG)

var operatingTime = hour - getDataShudownTime

var performance = (getDataCycletime * totalCount) / operatingTime
performance = parseFloat(performance.toFixed(2))

flow.set("Performance", performance)
flow.set("Operating_Time", operatingTime)
flow.set("Hour", hour)

msg.payload = performance
return msg;
